title: Family member says 3-year-old dies after shooting herself
content:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) -
A 3-year-old girl has died after she accidentally shot herself Wednesday night, a family member said.
Authorities were working to confirm the family members' account.
Authorities initially said that the girl stabbed herself accidentally. However, officers at the scene could not determine how she was injured before she was taken to the hospital.
Police Chief Darryl Forte later said that toddler was "injured by a firearm."
Detectives are investigating to determine the means to which caused the juvenile's death," the police department said in a statement.
The child's devastated uncle told KCTV5's Josh Marshall that the girl managed to get ahold of a gun and accidentally shot herself.
Dispatchers received a call at 7:25 p.m. Wednesday that the child had been "cut" at a home near 31st Street and Spruce Avenue.
Family members are cooperating with police. There were adult family members inside the home at the time the girl was injured.
The girl's mother, who did not have custody of her child, said the shooting happened at the father's residence. The mother said she got a telephone call about the shooting and rushed to the hospital but it was too late. She said her daughter was shot in the stomach.
